courseLearnerProfile.title: Course Learner Profile
courseLearnerProfile.description: Here, you are able to view and update your course specific learner profile. These settings are used to calculate your learning progress and to better personalize your learning experience.

aimForGradeOrBonus.label: Aim for grade or additional knowledge
aimForGradeOrBonus.description: Choose the option that best describes your goal for this course.

timeInvestment.label: Time investment
timeInvestment.description: Choose how much time you are willing to invest in this course.

repetitionIntensity.label: Repetition Intensity
repetitionIntensity.description: Choose how much you are willing to repeat the course content.

feedbackLearnerProfile.title: Feedback Learner Profile
feedbackLearnerProfile.description: Here, you are able to view and update your preferences regarding your feedback learner profile. These settings are used to then personalize the automated feedback you get after submitting your exercise.

feedbackDetail.label: Level of Detail
feedbackDetail.description: Choose whether you prefer brief and straight to the point feedback or detailed feedback with explanations and examples.

feedbackFormality.label: Style of Feedback
feedbackFormality.description: Choose whether you prefer formal and professional feedback or friendly and approachable feedback.

feedbackLearnerProfile.invalidRange: Values must be true or false
feedbackLearnerProfile.error: Feedback learner profile could not be saved

onboardingModal.title: Which feedback feels better?
onboardingModal.subtitle: Take a look at these two examples and pick the one you'd rather get

briefFeedback.title: Brief Feedback
briefFeedback.subtitle: Short and straight to the point
